data.eml:eml: A new species of Tiodus (Hemiptera, Cercopidae) with a key to species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Paladini, Andressa, Cavichioli, Rodney Ramiro (2017): A new species of Tiodus (Hemiptera, Cercopidae) with a key to species of the genus. Zootaxa 4281 (1): 242-245, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4281.1.24
